MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH46 postcode area of Dolphinton, affecting properties in Newmill Farmhouse and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.30pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we are awaiting additional resources to arrive on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:05 PM on Sunday, 14 March 2021.
